metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3297 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Ubuntu's accountsservice an unprivileged local attacker can trigger a use-after-free vulnerability in accountsservice by sending a D-Bus message to the accounts-daemon process.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3297` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

accountsservice - 22.07.5-2ubuntu1.4
gir1.2-accountsservice-1.0 - 22.07.5-2ubuntu1.4
libaccountsservice0 - 22.07.5-2ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is GHSL-2023-139 Issue is in the Ubuntu-specific 0010-set-language.patch patch. eslerm> CWE-416

criterions.comment: accountsservice package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.07.5-2ubuntu1.4').
